name: Cerberus Mount Whistle
description: This whistle will call your ferocious cerberus companion to your side.

name: Sunite Key
description: A sunite key crafted especially for the gates in the mines, this will lead to the mine's deepest and most dangerous levels.

name: Glorite Key
description: Constructed of Glorite, this key can open the ancient locks of King Minos's Glorite mine.

name: King's Lost Mine Key
description: An ancient key that was held by King Aster, though it became lost after his time. What was Dynus doing with it?

name: King Minos's Emblem
description: An emblem stamped with the seal of King Minos, it grants its bearer access to the Midnight Isle.
